job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Content marketing platforms are facing unprecedented challenges: scaling content creation, optimizing for ever-changing data, and improving ROI are harder than ever. Despite the promise of AI, many solutions out there only scratch the surface, offering generic models that don't quite address the complex needs of content marketing teams. This means wasted time, underutilized resources, and missed growth opportunities for enterprises.

   At Contently, we're going beyond basic automation, using cutting-edge AI to solve deeply complex problems specific to content marketing, like how to intelligently recommend content, personalize campaigns, and boost engagement using LLMs. In this role, you will explore and implement AI solutions that directly change how global brands create, optimize, and measure their content strategies. It's not just about developing features; it's about transforming an industry.

   This role is tailor-made for someone who craves technical challenge. You'll not only be building end-to-end AI solutions-from writing custom algorithms and integrating machine learning models to deploying scalable cloud-based services-but you'll also have the freedom to experiment with the latest AI technologies. You'll have access to vast datasets, the freedom to iterate fast, and a direct line to see the impact your work has on real users. If you're the kind of engineer who loves to experiment, push boundaries, and innovate in a way that directly impacts product direction, this is the opportunity you've been waiting for.

   Join our team, where every line of code you write contributes to reshaping an industry. You'll work alongside experts in AI, design, and product management, ensuring your innovations translate into features that make a measurable difference for users. If this sounds like your kind of challenge, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing and implementing AI-driven features and tools to enhance our content marketing platform
     * Conducting experiments and exploring new AI technologies, including LLMs, to identify potential applications for Contently, * Develop AI-powered applications to reduce operational costs
job_details.full_text:
Artificial Intelligence Engineer, Contently (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Content marketing platforms are facing unprecedented challenges: scaling content creation, optimizing for ever-changing data, and improving ROI are harder than ever. Despite the promise of AI, many solutions out there only scratch the surface, offering generic models that don't quite address the complex needs of content marketing teams. This means wasted time, underutilized resources, and missed growth opportunities for enterprises.

   At Contently, we're going beyond basic automation, using cutting-edge AI to solve deeply complex problems specific to content marketing, like how to intelligently recommend content, personalize campaigns, and boost engagement using LLMs. In this role, you will explore and implement AI solutions that directly change how global brands create, optimize, and measure their content strategies. It's not just about developing features; it's about transforming an industry.

   This role is tailor-made for someone who craves technical challenge. You'll not only be building end-to-end AI solutions-from writing custom algorithms and integrating machine learning models to deploying scalable cloud-based services-but you'll also have the freedom to experiment with the latest AI technologies. You'll have access to vast datasets, the freedom to iterate fast, and a direct line to see the impact your work has on real users. If you're the kind of engineer who loves to experiment, push boundaries, and innovate in a way that directly impacts product direction, this is the opportunity you've been waiting for.

   Join our team, where every line of code you write contributes to reshaping an industry. You'll work alongside experts in AI, design, and product management, ensuring your innovations translate into features that make a measurable difference for users. If this sounds like your kind of challenge, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing and implementing AI-driven features and tools to enhance our content marketing platform
     * Conducting experiments and exploring new AI technologies, including LLMs, to identify potential applications for Contently, * Develop AI-powered applications to reduce operational costs

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building end-to-end AI solutions using LLMs, integrating machine learning models, and deploying scalable cloud-based services specifically for content marketing applications. It highlights developing AI-powered applications, exploring new AI technologies like LLMs, and transforming an industry through these innovations, which aligns strongly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer focused on language and interaction.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integrating machine learning models' and 'Develop AI-powered applications' directly relates to the creation and application of models.
The phrase 'writing custom algorithms' indicates the development of new models or model components.
The phrase 'exploring new AI technologies, including LLMs' points to working with generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: exploring new AI technologies, including LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'building end-to-end AI solutions' implies creating complete software systems that incorporate AI.
The phrase 'deploying scalable cloud-based services' refers to the software engineering aspect of making AI solutions available.
The phrase 'Developing and implementing AI-driven features and tools' indicates the creation of software functionalities.
job_tasks.phrase: Developing and implementing AI-driven features and tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop AI-powered applications' directly relates to building software applications.
The phrase 'deploying scalable cloud-based services' also touches upon the operational aspect of making services live and scalable.

The description mentions 'scaling content creation, optimizing for ever-changing data, and improving ROI' and 'solve deeply complex problems specific to content marketing', indicating a need to understand business challenges.
job_tasks.phrase: scaling content creation, optimizing for ever-changing data, and improving ROI

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'intelligently recommend content, personalize campaigns, and boost engagement' describes business outcomes that AI solutions should achieve.
job_tasks.phrase: intelligently recommend content, personalize campaigns, and boost engagement

soft_skills.phrase: freedom to experiment with the latest AI technologies
experiment with the latest AI technologies
work alongside experts in AI, design, and product management
